item.title: Rural Villa in Ferpicloz
item.description: Province Germania Superior Province Description Location Ferpicloz Ferpicloz (Pleiades) Location Description Sublocation Sublocation Description Garden Rural Villa in Ferpicloz Keywords archaeological garden \ porticoes rural villas villae rusticae Garden Description The house of this villa rustica was of the winged corridor type (A in Fig. 1) with a porticoed facade (Fig. 1). Attached to the eastern end of the house, measuring 37 x 46 meters, was a wall running east-west which has been interpreted as the protective wall of a garden (G in Fig. 1). Maps Plans Fig. 1: Plan of the rural villa (A) with a possible garden (G) protected by a wall to the east of the main building. The shoreline of the lake is dotted.
